package com.example.serialization;

import java.io.Serializable;

public class Customer implements Serializable{
	
	
	 // id used to identify sender of the serialized object
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 34523090568L; 
	
	
	private transient String name; 
	private int id;
	
	public Customer(String filename, String filename2) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	
	
	

	public void Customer1(String name, String string) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Customer [name=" + name + ", id=" + id + "]";
	}

	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}



	public void buy() {
		System.out.println("How much this Car cost");
	}
	public void drive() {
		System.out.println("Let's have a test drive");
	}

	public void buy1() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}




	public void buy11() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}
	
	

}
